description: On February 23, 2021, Mongolia launched a COVID-19 vaccination campaign across the country on Tuesday, with frontline workers in the health and security sectors receiving the first jabs. On Monday night received 300,000 doses of Sinopharm COVID-19 vaccine donated by China.
